# Speke

> Speke is an enterprise-focused communication platform that combines structured team messaging with drop-in voice channels for distributed companies.

## Product Positioning
- Built for enterprises and established companies modernizing remote collaboration.
- Solves the gap between Slack-style text coordination and Discord-style instant voice communication.
- Prioritizes organization-level privacy and controlled team access.

## Core Capabilities
- Text channels for organized, persistent team communication.
- Call channels for instant in-and-out voice collaboration.
- Presence and speaking indicators for live coordination.
- Organization boundaries with invite links and role-aware membership model.

## Primary Audience
- Operations, IT, and leadership teams at medium and large companies.
- Hybrid and remote-first organizations needing faster internal communication loops.
- Teams that need private company workspaces rather than public community-oriented chat tools.

## Canonical URLs
- Website: https://virtual-office-dev.janhoon.com/
- Live Application: https://virtual-office-dev.janhoon.com/
